ðŸ’ŽPika World Update 9 March 2022ðŸ’ŽðŸ§¯A directionless marketðŸ¥ŠThe market appeared fickle minded on Tuesday. It was down in the early trading hours  only to recover sharply and then fall again to the red. The last hour saw the stocks' gain evaporating as the weak attempt to rebound seemed to fade.Ceasefire by Russia and Ukraine temporarily to help evacuate civilians from Sumy does not appear to signal the end of a war. Such fear can be seen in the commodity trading market that had been rising sharply.Market participants are now confronted with the worries of a slowing economy  high inflation and an upcoming Fed hike  which are recipes for a challenging trading week ahead. On Monday  Europe Dax also fell into the bear market and remained steady on Tuesday. Indices in Asia also painted a bleak future.ðŸ•¹The Heart of Russia's economyðŸ’°As President Biden announced his ban on importing Russian oil  it was a direct hit on the Russian economy. However  he acknowledged that European allies might find it tough to join the US given their massive reliance on Russia for energy supply.Nonetheless  the European Union signalled unity with the US by stating that they intend to reduce their reliance on Russian gas by two thirds this year. However  President Biden also acknowledged that such a ban on Russian oil would negatively impact the US  leading to higher oil prices and exacerbating the inflation fear.Yet the move has bipartisan support as Congress supports measures to hit Russia with energy sanctions despite the impact on oil prices. Oil prices had already jumped more than 60% this year.ðŸ”‹Is Russia  a vital energy player?ðŸ”¦Indeed  the US imported about 8% of the need for oil and refined products from Russia last year. A large portion of its requirements is imported from Canada  Mexico and Saudi Arabia. Still  their purchase from Russia has been rising over the years.For the UK  Russia accounts for about 4% of the total gas supply in 2021  which some import from Norway.The market will likely be filled with a flurry of updates and consequences and stay pressured.It is 9 March  Wednesday  at 7.10  am in Singapore and 7.10 pm in New York.The day has been a roller coaster as we see much gain in portfolio falling fast. Pika World hopes everyone has a healthy week ahead.Cheers Pika Nat.
